response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,000,000, but I am willing to consider a negotiation. My initial offer for this product is $1,500,000. I trust that its significance and potential impact on your endeavors will justify this investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 1500000}
